General.Name: Heineken Holding NV
General.Description: Heineken Holding N.V., through its subsidiaries, engages in brewing and selling beer and cider in the Netherlands and internationally. The company's portfolio consists of approximately 300 international, regional, local, and specialty beers and ciders. The company was founded in 1864 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. Heineken Holding N.V. is a subsidiary of L'Arche Green N.V.

5.Name: Mr. Jan Cornelis Van Der Linden
5.Title: Managing Director of China Bus.
